issues.description:
In the function `GetGift()` the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.timestamp
issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

issues.description:
In the function `GetGift()` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to msg.sender.

There is a check on storage index 1. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `PutGift(address)`.
There is a check on storage index 2. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `PutGift(address)`.
issues.title: Ether send
